translations: 使（透镜）重新聚焦；使（眼睛）重新对准；改变（注意力的）重点；改变（资源的）使用范围

sentences.sentence: When the time is up, refocus on your next task.
sentences.translation: 当时间到了，重新专注于你的下一个任务。

sentences.sentence: People can revisit and refocus an image, days, months, even years later.
sentences.translation: 人们可以在几天、几个月、甚至几年后重新审视和调整图像。

sentences.sentence: Policymakers who refocus efforts on improving well-being rather than simply worrying about GDP figures could avoid the forecasted doom and may even see progress.
sentences.translation: 如果政策制定者将注意力放在改善福祉上，而不是单纯担心 GDP 数据，就能避免预测中的厄运，甚至可能看到进展。
